#labels 服务端配置
<p>服务端配置<br />
  //////////////////<br />
  config.conf</p>
<p> 服务器端口<br />
  数据库连接<br />
  用户表字段等信息<br />
  例：<br />
  --端口<br />
  port = 8222<br />
  --进程数，最大为50个进程，<br />
  pthread = 5<br />
  --数据库验证<br />
  dbhost = &quot;localhost&quot;<br />
  dbport = 3306<br />
  dbuser = &quot;root&quot;<br />
  dbpass = &quot;&quot;<br />
  dbname = &quot;ucenter&quot;<br />
  dbtable = &quot;uc_members&quot;<br />
  fieldusername = &quot;username&quot;<br />
  fieldpassword = &quot;password&quot;<br />
  fieldsalt = &quot;salt&quot;<br />
  /////////////////<br />
  account.conf</p>
<p>加密串认证信息<br />
  例：<br />
  --账户列表<br />
  myleft = &quot;myleft&quot;<br />
  doris = &quot;doris7&quot;<br />
  ////////////////////</p>
